mapper.insert: insert into package (sellerNum, cateNum, packageName, content, packagePrice, stock, startDate, endDate, packageUnit, imgUrl) values (#{sellerNum}, #{cateNum}, #{packageName}, #{content}, #{packagePrice}, #{stock}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{packageUnit}, #{imgUrl})
mapper.update: update package set cateNum=#{cateNum}, packageName=#{packageName}, content=#{content}, packagePrice=#{packagePrice}, stock=#{stock}, startDate=#{startDate}, endDate=#{endDate}, packageUnit=#{packageUnit}, updatedAt=#{updatedAt}, imgUrl=#{imgUrl} where packageNum=#{packageNum}
